Conditions Treated

Dr. Kolli specializes in the treatment of children, adolescents, and adults with a wide variety of conditions. These include the comprehensive evaluation and treatment of:

  • Attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder (ADHD)
  • Mood disorders (including depression and bipolar disorder)
  • Anxiety disorders (including obsessive-compulsive disorder, post-traumatic stress disorder, generalized anxiety and panic disorder)
  • Autism and developmental delay
  • Psychiatric conditions associated with chronic medical conditions
  • Substance abuse
  • Tics and Tourette Syndrome
  • Eating disorders
  • Learning disabilities
  • Child and adolescent delinquency (including conduct disorder and oppositional defiant disorder)
  • Schizophrenia and psychosis, including child and adolescent on-set

All services provided by Dr. Kolli take place in her office on a personalized, private, one-on-one basis.
